com.sb.elsinore

Class OutputControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sb.elsinore.OutputControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class OutputControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    OutputControl controls multiple output GPIOs. Heat_SSR is a GPIO pin that represents a heating output. Cool_SSR is a GPIO pin that represents a cooling output.
    Author:
    Doug Edey

      Create a heating and cooling output.

             java.lang.String fGPIO,

        Constructor for a heat only pin.
        Parameters:
        aName - Name of this instance.
        fGPIO - the heating GPIO pin.
        heatTime - the duty time for the heating output.

      • OutputControl

        public OutputControl(java.lang.String aName,
             java.lang.String gpioHeat,
             double heatTime,
             java.lang.String gpioCool,
             double coolTime,
             double inCoolDelay)
        Create a heating and cooling output.
        Parameters:
        aName - The name of this instance
        gpioHeat - The heating GPIO pin.
        heatTime - The heating cycle time.
        gpioCool - The cooling GPIO pin
        coolTime - The cooling cycle time
        inCoolDelay - The delay between cooling start/stop calls.

           double time,
           double delay)
        Set the current cooling information.
        Parameters:
        gpio - The GPIO to use for the cooling output
        time - The cycle time for the cooling output
        delay - The delay between cooling start/stop calls.

      • run

        public void run()
        The main loop that checks and activates the outputs. Based on the duty cycle and time.
